eu_initiatives:
The FTTH Council Europe is focussing on ensuring a positive and constructive legal and regulatory famework to enable the deployment of fibre access networks in Europe. Topics covered by the FTTH Council (examples): 
- Digital Single Market 
- Cost Reduction 
- Long Term Financing 
- Connecting Europe Facility
organisation_name: FTTH Council Europe ASBL (FTTH Council Europe)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The FTTH Council Europe is an industry organisation with a mission to accelerate the availability of fibre‐based, ultra‐high‐speed access networks to consumers and businesses. The Council promotes this technology because it will deliver a flow of new services that enhances the quality of life, contributes to a better environment and increased competitiveness. The FTTH Council Europe consists of more than 140 members companies. Its members include leading telecommunications companies and many world leaders in the telecommunication industry.
